item.description: Gain valuable skills and build community at the same time! Charles & Julia Yelton of Humastacia Permaculture Gardens will be offering a FREE No-Dig, Weed-Free Gardening Workshop in Cape Elizabeth. Learn the permaculture concepts behind this method and apply your new knowledge with some hands-on exercises. Bring your work gloves! Meet like-minded people over a delicious potluck lunch; bring something to share and Lisa & David will provide a main dish. No charge, but RSVP is required so we have an accurate head count. We will finish up around 3:00 pm.

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: FREE No-Dig, Weed-Free Gardening Workshop & Potluck Lunch
